messages.subject: gift ideas
messages.msgSnippet: There s one essay I had in the new book that I pulled, but I ve just put it out in public for the first time: http://sandradodd.com/gifts It was published
messages.messageBody:
There's one essay I had in the new book that I pulled, but I've just put it
out in public for the first time:

http://sandradodd.com/gifts

It was published locally, way back when, and is called "Gifts for Guys to
Buy," but it could work for women too. It's about finding kid-gifts in hardware
stores and such places, for those who have to be there anyway.

So while I'm at it, I should remind people that it's a good time to buy
gifts, and that I have a book for sale.
http://sandradodd.com/puddlebook

And now I must go to the post office and to thrift stores and think about
Christmas.

Sandra



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
